sentences.sContent: Process of soaking up or assimilation of one substance by another.
sentences.sContent_eng: Process of soaking up or assimilation of one substance by another.
sentences.sCn: 一种介质向另一种介质渗透和同化的过程。

sentences.sContent: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.sCn: 英国文艺复兴初期只是一个学习模仿与同化的阶段。

sentences.sContent: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.sCn: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

synos.tran: [生理]同化；吸收；[地质][生化]同化作用

phrases.pCn: 氮同化；氮素同化；氮素同化作用

remMethod.val: as + simil(相同) + ation → 使相同 → 同化

words.tran: 同化的；同化力的；同化作用的
吸收；使同化；把…比作；使相似

trans.tranOther: the process of understanding and using new ideas
